channel.title: +1 Forward - Firebrands Series - Superstars: Racing Icons
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-firebrands-superstars-racing-icons
​Rach and Rich continue their third Summer Series. This series covers games in the Firebrands style of PbtA games. This sixth episode of the series features Tristan and Pete, creators of *​Superstars: Racing Icons* .
Timecodes: 00:03:52- Setting Up 00:12:27 - The Challenge 00:22:39 - Playing the Games
Find Superstars: Racing Icons here: https://feelingfickle.itch.io/superstars-racing-icons Follow Tristan on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/feelingfickle Follow Pete on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/Pete_Volk
